response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product holds immense value to us, but its worth to you is equally significant. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $7,500 for you to experience all its features. I believe this offer strikes a fair balance between our interests and provides you with an opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product.", "product_price": 7500}
